mapper.insert: insert into synchronhistory (createrId, senderId, eventId, receiverId, createDate) values (#{createrId},#{senderId},#{eventId},#{receiverId},#{createDate});
mapper.select: select count(1) num from (select COUNT(id) num from synchronhistory where senderId = #{userId} and isSucceed = 1 GROUP BY createDate) as sss
select count(1) num from (select COUNT(id) num from synchronhistory where senderId = #{userId} GROUP BY createDate) as sss
select COUNT(1) num from synchronhistory where receiverId = #{userId} and status <> 0
select COUNT(1) num from synchronhistory where receiverId = #{userId} and status = 0
